name: Michelle Chen
bio: Hi, I’m Michelle! I’m a full-stack engineer. I like uncovering how things work and thinking of ways to improve them. I enjoy learning new ways to solve a problem and solving new problems. With six years of experience in marketing, I have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, an obsession with creating scalable and efficient solutions, a knack for thinking outside of the box, and strong empathy for the end user. I’m passionate about leveling the playfield and making the world more accessible through technology. I’m looking for opportunities to create apps that better lives.
